message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, but recognizing its potential worth to you, I propose a deal. For a limited time, I am offering it to you for $11,000. This price reflects the quality and value I believe it brings to someone like yourself. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations or if you would like to discuss further details. I look forward to potentially working with you.
